Translations.Text: Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Meryem, asmi taazel iman is, si twacult is, di tama ugmuv
Terra ssteo garas yidsen. Nuzen as d ooue nne£. £uoes, amzun d amdan ifuqen
Tenna: "ad iyi Eerz Uenin, segk, ma tepeezzibev
Inna: "nek, d amersul kan n Mass im, ad am fke$ aqcic iufan
Tenna: "amek ara sau$ aqcic, ur iyi innul umdan, ur lli$ d tazennant
Inna: "Akka. Inna d Mass im: ayagi, ishel fellI. A t Nerr d assekni i medden, d aeunu s$uone£. D lameo ippueeppmen
Tebbwi tadist; syis taazel iman is, di tama ibaaden
Bdan p id inzikmiren ar loedra n tezdayt. Tenna: "anna$ lemmer mmute$, uqbel ayagi, ad pwappu$ akw
Issawel as d, seddaw as: "kkes a$wbel, ih, Mass im Irra i$eeo, seddaw am
Hucc, ar $uoem, loedra n tezdayt, ad am d i$li ppmeo amaynut ibwan
Ecc, ssew, ssefoee ieoi m. Ma twalav yiwen n umdan, ini as: nek, s tidep, ueame$ i Uenin, ur pmeslaye$, assa, i umdan
Toue yis ar ugdud is, tebbwi t. Nnan: "a Meryem! Ni$ tusiv d, s temsalt ihejjnen
A ultmas n Haoun, ur illi baba m d argaz ucmit, ur telli imma m d tazennant
Teswaad $uoes. Nnan: "amek ara nemmeslay i uuebyan di ddue
Inna: "nek d amdan n Oebbi. Ifka yi d Tazmamt. Irra yi d nnbi
Ioqa yi anda lli$. Iweuua yi taeallit, u zzakat, skud mazal iyi d amuddir
Ad bedde$ i yimma. Ur iyi Irri d aqehhao, ne$ d ccaqi
Tifrat felli asmi d lule$, asmi ara mmte$, asmi ara d u$ale$ d amuddir
D wagi ay d Aisa, mmi s n Meryem. D awal n tidep, i$ef cukken
Ur iuwib ara, i Oebbi, ad Isau kra n mmi S. Gedha syiS! Ma Iseyya lameo, ad as Yini kan: "ili"! Ad yili
Oebbi, s tidep, d Mass iw, d Mass nnwen. Ihi, aabdet eP. D wagi ay d abrid uwqim
Mgarraden ikabaren garasen. A tawa$it n wid ijehlen, mara walin ass abarar
Ara slen, ara walin, ass ideg ara d asen $uone£! Maca, imednas, assa, di ttelfan s uuee
Nabi ten, $ef ass n ssixia, mara iuao lameo. Nitni, di l$eflan, nitni ur uminen
Ih, d Nekwni, ara Iweoten tamurt akked wayen illan fellas. £uone£ tu$alin nnsen
